North West Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest North West Area north-west-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
North West
Championship
Jazz
Winter Gardens (Opera House Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £200 and People Challenge Trophy, 2nd £100 and Regional Secretary's Trophy, 3rd £75 and George Davenport Memorial Trophy, 4th £50 music voucher, 5th £40 music voucher, 6th £30 music voucher. All 6 prize winners receive a North West Regional Committe Glass Trophy. 9 bands competed
